fields.label: Important!
fields.message:
Once published please visit the Widgets Page to begin adding widgets. Please make sure to select this sidebar on the appropriate page by following these steps:
  1. Go to the page you wish to add this sidebar to
  2. Select the sidebar using the sidebar selector field
  3. Save the page

fields.label: Alternate Page Title
fields.name: h1_title
fields.instructions: Allows page title text to be changed from default page title

fields.label: Full Width Banner
fields.name: banner_full_width
fields.instructions: Allows the image to expand to fill the screen

fields.label: Alternate Page Title
fields.name: h1_title
fields.instructions: Allows page title text to be changed from default page title

fields.label: Full Width Banner
fields.name: banner_full_width
fields.instructions: Allows the image to expand to fill the screen

fields.label: Ribbons
fields.name: ribbons
fields.instructions: Creates a full width colored section with content area and callout

sub_fields.label: Ribbon Description
sub_fields.name: ribbon_description
sub_fields.instructions: Please provide a brief description of this ribbon for ADA requirements. ex. department calendar

sub_fields.label: Enable Callout
sub_fields.name: callout
sub_fields.instructions: Enables callout feature

sub_fields.label: Callout
sub_fields.name: callout_content
sub_fields.instructions: A callout allows for a descriptive text field related to the main ribbon content area

fields.label: Back to Top Button
fields.name: back_to_top
fields.instructions: Enables back to top icon on page or post

sub_fields.label: Address
sub_fields.name: address
sub_fields.instructions: Street Address

sub_fields.label: Locality
sub_fields.name: locality
sub_fields.instructions: City, State Zip-Code Country

sub_fields.label: Phone
sub_fields.name: phone
sub_fields.instructions: Area code and phone number, no punctuation

sub_fields.label: Contact Link
sub_fields.name: link
sub_fields.instructions: URL or email address can be used

fields.label: Element Type
fields.name: element_type
fields.instructions: Please select the element to be created

fields.label: Posts Per Row
fields.name: posts_per_row
fields.instructions: Amount of posts to display per row (max 3)

fields.label: Link Farm
fields.name: ui_link_farm
fields.instructions: Add the amount of columns you want the links to span (maximum of 4)

sub_fields.label: Links
sub_fields.name: links
sub_fields.instructions: Select the pages for this column, icons are optional

sub_fields.label: Use Custom Image
sub_fields.name: custom_image
sub_fields.instructions: Allow custom image to be uploaded instead of using an icon

sub_fields.label: Link Element
sub_fields.name: link_element
sub_fields.instructions: Allow dashboard item to be linked to a page

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Min size: (64x64px) Max size: (256x256px)

sub_fields.label: Background
sub_fields.name: background
sub_fields.instructions: Adds background around icon / image

sub_fields.label: Alt Category Name
sub_fields.name: alt_category_name
sub_fields.instructions: Allows for the selected category name to be changed

sub_fields.label: Displayed Posts
sub_fields.name: post_type
sub_fields.instructions: Displays latest posts from selected category or allows for custom posts to be selected

sub_fields.label: Posts Per Row
sub_fields.name: posts_per_row
sub_fields.instructions: Amount of posts to display per row (max 3)

sub_fields.label: Post Size
sub_fields.name: post_size
sub_fields.instructions: Size of post block.

sub_fields.label: Post Count
sub_fields.name: post_count
sub_fields.instructions: Amount of posts to display

sub_fields.label: Posts
sub_fields.name: custom_posts
sub_fields.instructions: Please select desired posts to display.

sub_fields.label: Link Text
sub_fields.name: link_text
sub_fields.instructions: Replaces default page/post title.

sub_fields.label: Link Text
sub_fields.name: link_text_required
sub_fields.instructions: Replaces default page/post title.

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image
sub_fields.instructions: Background image for grid item

sub_fields.label: Image
sub_fields.name: image_required
sub_fields.instructions: Background image for grid item

sub_fields.label: Font Awesome Icon
sub_fields.name: fa_icon
sub_fields.instructions: Select a font awesome icon OR upload an svg icon

sub_fields.label: Uploaded Icon
sub_fields.name: uploaded_icon
sub_fields.instructions: File must be an SVG file.

sub_fields.label: Icon Link
sub_fields.name: icon_link
sub_fields.instructions: The link title will not be shown. The item title takes precedent.

fields.label: Alternate Page Title
fields.name: h1_title
fields.instructions: Allows page title text to be changed from default page title

fields.label: Banner Image
fields.name: banner_image
fields.instructions: Once selected, image can be cropped to the recommended 20:7 aspect ratio.

fields.label: Full Width
fields.name: banner_full_width
fields.instructions: Allows the image to expand to fill the screen

sub_fields.label: Video
sub_fields.name: video
sub_fields.instructions: Recommended size 1920x750, only supports MP4 extension.

sub_fields.label: Video Poster
sub_fields.name: video_poster
sub_fields.instructions: This image will be displayed while the video is loading or on mobile viewports.

fields.label: Secondary Title
fields.name: secondary_title
fields.instructions: Adds a secondary title to the post, appears beneath the main title
